string.text: Well you're a wimp Strelok, you benefit nothing. So thanks from us you will not get.
Not bad stalker, shooting the mutants. But with only one talent your not that special, so if you want to pass you have to pay.
Ok Strelok you really helped us greatly. We will assume that you have paid for the passage. You can go to the Bar.
Let them get close so that no one will miss their targets. I will shoot first, then you.
Stalker you are in territory controlled by 'Duty'. Any act of aggression and you will be punished.
'Welcome everyone!', says an outpost 'Duty' guy at Garbage, 'From Dark Valley in the direction of the Bar is a wave of mutants. Everyone who shoots these vermin thanks from us is guaranteed'.
Stalker you are in 'Duty'. If you whoop it up you will receive the fourth degree of disability!
Good job guys we have overcome them. All rest now, and you stalker come here and chat.
This is 'Peoples', leader of the 'Neutrals': We drove out from the abandoned vehicles parking lot some bandits. We assume they will reciprocate. We have very little power so please come to our aid.
